import axios from'axios';const API_BASE='http://localhost:5000/api';// Productos
export const getProducts=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/products"));return res.data;};// Registro de usuario
export const register=async userData=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/auth/register"),userData);return res.data;};// Login de usuario
export const login=async userData=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/auth/login"),userData);return res.data;};
